net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_chatTokenOutput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Generate a table of output for a single token

arg(0) = Token Object
  {
    "id": Id of the token being displayed,
    "text": Text added to the token name,
    "bgColor": Optional: background color applied to token name and text
  }

arg(1) = List of texts & images to be displayed, one column each
To show a column of text send this object in the list:
  {
    "text": Text that is displayed,
    "bgColor": Optional: Background color applied to text,
    "to": Optional: JSON array of groups & players that should see this text. Defaults to all
  }
To show a column with an image in it send this object in the list:
  {
    "image": Asset reference ,
    "text": Alt text for the image,
    "to": Optional: JSON array of groups & players that should see this text. Defaults to all
  }

arg(2) = Optional json array of what groups & players are actually broadcast. Defaults to gm, owner, other groups

The macro broadcasts a table to chat that shows the following columns to the user & groups specified:
  1. The token image
  2. Token name and passed text in the background color
  3. For each text object in the array:
    Text in the background color sent only certain players or groups
  4. For each image object in the array:
    Image sent only certain players or groups
The last two are added in the same order they were passed in arg(1)
